synopsis.text: Life for 18-year-old Aida Yurume takes an unexpected turn as she settles into her new home, the Maison du Wish apartment complex, teeming with fellow ronin - high school graduates striving to secure a coveted university spot. As Yurume buckles down to conquer the university entrance exam, the arrival of her neighbor Sae's stern younger sister adds a chaotic twist to her daily routine. The younger sister vows not to depart until her disorganized older sibling tackles the mountain of unpacked boxes and clutter. Amidst the comedic upheaval, Yurume's unpredictable journey at the Maison du Wish promises laughter, growth, and a touch of insanity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
